title: All skins?
body:
I love playing Blitzcrank, I have him lvl 7, he is my most played champion and I have bought all his skins with the exception of Riot, Rusty and Goalkeeper.

I think Riot should allow people who have ALL the PURCHASABLE skins on a champion the opportunity to purchase the legacy skins. Thoughts?

replies.body: Dude no that just makes the skin like every other normal skin, it isnt special ...

Not really, because if it was like every other skin then you'd be able to buy it straight up. This way only the most die-hard blitz (as an example) players would be able to get the legacy's. Then they'd be able to brag about having all the skins for that champ. I think it's a cool idea.
Then the skins wouldnt be legacy anymore

Stupid idea to fish money out of people, you're literally saying "If someone has the money to buy every available skin on a champion they get to buy the legacy skins", do you even know what "legacy" means? Stupid idea Stupid Post
Yeah this will never happen. I know it sucks, but that's the entire point of having rare skins. The things I would do for a Mighty Jax skin.

I wish I could get judgment and silver Kayle somehow. But I wouldn't want to diminish the value of them to people who own them. If they became available the appeal would be lost to me though. Its a catch 22 situation. Maybe if there was a hextech method of getting them it could be worthy.
